description: More Than An Exchange, buy, swap, bridge and stake your cryptocurrencies from a single interface.
value_prop:
Why BIM Protocol?
BIM Protocol has been audited and secured. The protocol is completely open source, which allows anyone to interact with a user interface client, API or directly with the smart contracts on the Polygon network and other EVM blockchain. Being open source means that you are able to build any third-party service or application to interact with the protocol and enrich your product.
How do I use the BIM protocol?
How to use the BIM protocol? To Buy Sell, Bridge, Provide Liquidity, Swap Tokens, or Vote on Governance Proposals, go to the https://exchange.bim.finance/ interface and connect a Web3 wallet.

description: An integrated digital asset and fiat accounting platform for institutions!
value_prop:
BlockPeer is a blockchain wallet integrated accounting platform. Safe multisig wallets are natively integrated into BlockPeer. Finance teams from web3 and web2 can seamlessly create and operate Safe multisig wallets from our integrated digital asset and fiat accounting platform.

Coupled with in-built MPC wallets, BlockPeer just needs an email to create an EOA wallet and Safe multisig wallets. A simple login flow resembles a typical web2 accounting platform login process, a web2-like UI.

Safe multisig is deeply integrated into the Accounts Payable (AP) workflows in BlockPeer. Accounting context for signers to understand the underlying payment transaction and automatic accounting for bills paid through BlockPeer's Safe interface adds significant value to finance teams!

description: Cobo Safe is a DeFi-focused custody solution that leverages multi-signature and multi-party computation (MPC) to secure digital assets in decentralized finance applications. It provides fine-grained access controls, automated smart contract interactions, and real-time audit trails to safeguard against unauthorized transactions. Integrated with our integration of SAFE (Arugus), it offers on-chain monitoring and analytics tailored for DeFi, enabling users to track asset movements, liquidity positions, and other critical blockchain events across multiple protocols. Together, Cobo Safe and Argus enhance security and operational transparency, making them ideal for institutional investors and custodians in the DeFi space.

description: Coinbase provides a user-friendly platform for buying and selling digital currencies, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, catering to individuals, businesses, and developers in the cryptocurrency market.

Coinrule lets you automate your trading like a pro, fully automated, non-custodial, and on chain. No code, no limits. Launch powerful, lightning fast strategies on chain with indicators, time your moves, or DCA in and out with just a few clicks. With tools once reserved for hedge funds, Coinrule gives everyday investors an edge in a 24/7 market. Backed by Y Combinator and trusted by over 350,000 traders. Coinrule uses session keys for account abstraction to ensure that users have complete self custody over their funds.
value_prop: Today’s financial markets are driven by algorithms, putting regular traders at an instant disadvantage especially in the 24 hour cryptocurrency markets. Coinrule aims to democratize algorithmic trading, enabling everyday investors and small funds to automate strategies with a simple interface. By removing the technical and financial barriers to entry, Coinrule delivers institutional-grade trading capabilities to retail investors and small funds through an intuitive, no-code platform. Giving users the ability to compete in markets traditionally dominated by hedge funds and high-frequency traders.
primary_integration: Core SDK, Safe Contracts, Core Transaction Service API
modules_guards:
Rhinestone's:  
ERC-7579, Ownable Validator, Smart Sessions, sudoPolicy, spendingLimitsPolicy, universalActionPolicy, valueLimitPolicy
safe_apps_smart: Coinrule utilizes Smart Accounts to deliver secure, self-custodial, and automated DeFi trading. Each user, upon connecting a wallet, is issued a Safe Smart Account controlled exclusively by their Signer Wallet. The connected Signer Wallet retains full control and authority, ensuring that Coinrule never has custody of user funds. Smart Accounts enable powerful features like multi-signature security, gasless transactions (via paymaster), transaction batching, and the use of a Smart Session Manager. We use session keys for scoped, temporary permissions to automate strategies and execute trades onchain without requiring users to constantly approve each action. These keys allow Coinrule to manage complex strategies like DCAs, Portfolio rebalancing, stop-loss, Grid Trading and custom strategies using technical indicators or trading view signals securely and seamlessly. Coinrule integrates Rhinestone Automations to monitor triggers off-chain and initiate on-chain actions based on user-defined rules. Through this architecture, Coinrule delivers an experience akin to centralized exchanges like automation with no pop-up fatigue, all while preserving true full self-custody and decentralization.

FailSafe is a leading provider of wallet firewall solutions that protect users from scams and hacks. Their innovative technology ensures peace of mind by monitoring transactions globally across Ethereum, Polygon, and BNB Chain, preventing asset loss an...
value_prop:
People who use Safe could face big risks if someone discovers their owner's private keys or tricks them into giving access to their wallets. These risks can lead to losing all their money in the wallet, which can be really bad.
FailSafe works with Gnosis Safe to add an extra layer of protection. It keeps an eye on all transactions that try to move money out of the wallet. If it sees something suspicious, it steps in quickly to move the money to a safe place.

On-chain platform that automates fund admin and eliminates costly intermediaries.
value_prop: Fume was born out of the frustration we faced while managing our own investment fund in traditional finance. Despite living in an era where blockchain technology exists, we found ourselves paying hefty fees to intermediaries like fund administrators for tasks that could easily be automated. The inefficiency, reliance on multiple intermediaries, and lack of transparency in the existing system led us to envision a more efficient, transparent, and streamlined solution. We built Fume to eliminate these inefficiencies by leveraging blockchain technology, removing intermediaries, and automating fund administration tasks.
primary_integration: Safe Apps SDK, Core Transaction Service API
packages: Safe Core SDK, Transaction Service API, safe-apps-wagmi
safe_apps_smart:
We are currently integrating privy.io to help with this. This will allow us to:

- sponsor transactions for our users. Some of them are not blockchain literate, and we want to make it as easy as possible to onboard them.
- batch together multiple transactions. Some actions that should be straightforward require multiple transactions and signatures from our users (example: approval + transfer). This will be streamlined.
- Automate transactions. Users will be able to delegate certain very specific transaction rights to bots/servers, and this will further automate the administration of a fund.
- let users log in without a wallet, and have multiple recovery avenues for private keys
- users can sign transaction with secure web2 elements such as passkeys (very easy and more familiar than clunky wallets)

description: Safe Monitor is a safe transaction relayer using Gashawk’s intelligent submission strategy that can save Safe users thousands of dollars (10% to 90%) in transaction cost.
value_prop:
Friction less safe transactions- gas less transactions
Cost savings for gas cost - 10% to 90%
Submit transactions via private mempool (flashbots etc.)
Easy management of multisig keys as they do need to be funded
Users only need to pay for the service if they save cost on transactions
Help on board new users such as DAOs, companies, VCs etc.
Reduced development overhead for safe transaction pipelines making it much easier for individual companies using safe accounts. Since, they will not required to manage and fund private keys for funding safe transactions.
Saves time and money for both individual and companies using safe accounts
safe_apps_smart:
We will be supporting all types of safe transactions that a user can do from the Safe-UI or via the safe APIs. Users will be able to add (or monitor) existing safe smart contract accounts via the Gashawk dashboard and automatically relay the transactions when the signature quorum is met.
This will allow easy onboarding and usage of safe smart accounts since all the transactions can be relayed by Safe Monitor providing a gasless experience without the need of maintaining funds on the multsig keys.
Users will be able to manage the safe transactions via Gashawk’s dashboard as well. Including advanced features such as setting the time limit for submission, funding the relayer wallet, check the savings achieved, auto handle duplicate nonces etc.

We are an engineering team passionate about liberty, blockchain, and math. You might know us as the inventors of zkSync

Mest is an open, user-friendly platform for sharing and labeling blockchain transactions and wallet collections. It aims to enrich the blockchain community by allowing users to contribute content that serves the public good. Mest aspires to be a central hub for valuable blockchain insights and a collective effort to navigate the blockchain landscape.
value_prop:
Mest's value proposition for Safe revolves around enhancing the visibility and understanding of transactions performed through Gnosis Safe. The core issue addressed by Mest is the difficulty in understanding transaction details due to the way Gnosis Safe executes transactions, often making it hard to discern the actual actions taken and the asset changes involved.
Mest offers a solution by parsing the execTransaction method calls within Gnosis Safe contracts to extract actionable data, counterparties, and even signer information from signatures. This allows for a deeper analysis and transformation of transaction data into human-readable forms, covering a wide range of scenarios like DEX swaps, NFT trades, bridging, lending, and more. Unlike other platforms that may not correctly interpret Safe transactions, leading to a lack of clarity on what was done and which assets were affected, Mest aims to provide a comprehensive breakdown.
Key improvements Mest brings to the table include:
• The ability to understand who the counterparties in a transaction are, even when they are Gnosis Safe wallets.
• Enhanced readability by parsing and displaying the actual method called instead of a generic execTransaction.
• Deeper transaction analysis that covers various scenarios beyond basic transfers, such as trades, liquidity actions, and more.
• Richer counterparty metadata, including logos and identities, to better understand transaction contexts.
• Accurate asset change analysis, as opposed to missing or incorrect information on other platforms.

description: Stream money in real-time with Sablier/Sablie
Rumpel is a point tokenization protocol. It enables secondary market liquidity and price discovery for offchain loyalty points.
value_prop:
Users are upset with the state of web3 points. Large point earners are feeling farmed because they can’t lock in a profit before an airdrop. Small point earners feel helpless and can’t “catch up” on point stacking. Both issues user apathy, making it difficult for projects to incentivize growth.

Rumpel solves these issues by tokenizing points, allowing them to trade on a secondary marketplace.

With Rumpel, users get liquidity and access to new markets, and projects keep the flexibility of their point programs.
modules_guards:
Custom Rumpel Module
Custom Rumpel Guard
safe_apps_smart:
Rumpel Wallet is built on top of Safe. Each user wallet is simply a standard Safe with a special Rumpel Module and Rumpel Guard added on.

Rumpel Guard – restricts Rumpel user actions to specific calls added onto the allowlist

Rumpel Module – enables the admin to make calls on a user's behalf, unless the calls are on the blocklist

Rumpel Wallet Factory – creates and initializes new Safe wallets with the Rumpel Module and Rumpel Guard

With a single click, users can access cross-chain yield opportunities, benefit from secure and effortless account abstraction (AA) for signups using Safw and passkey, and enjoy simplified DeFi activities such as earning across multiple protocols, etc —all designed to eliminate complexity while maximizing convenience and security.

safe_apps_smart: SeCuWa is a smart savings account built entirely on Safe Smart Account infrastructure, we utilize passkeys as the signer. With this setup, users can sign up effortlessly—no additional requirements are needed. By simply clicking the signup button on mobile or web, a Safe smart account is automatically created, enabling users to immediately access the opportunities and simplicity SeCuWa brings to on-chain savings.

description: Passwordless auth meets Multi-Party Computation (MPC), a self-custodial Wallet-as-a-service (WaaS) infrastructure for dApps and wallets
Building the world’s largest identity and financial network to serve as a public utility, giving ownership to everyone
Bridge DAI to xDAI and vice versa
A next-gen blazing fast self-custodial order book exchange that empowers crypto traders to trade without trade-offs
value_prop:
Yamata is pioneering a new, dominant design for crypto trading, merging blazing fast order books and advanced order types with a simple, self custodial, on-chain user experience that is made impossibly simple through account abstraction. By utilizing a novel OHX (Optimistic Hybrid Exchange Mechanism), Yamata ensures trustless, transparent trade validation without sacrificing performance.

Our ultimate goal is to empower crypto traders to trade without trade-offs.
safe_apps_smart:
All of our users automatically get a Safe Smart Account created upon first login. It is 2-of-2 type of the multisig account, user has one key and Yamata platform has another key. Additionally, the user can nominate recovery accounts and sign the transactions from the Smart Account with only one signature, providing there is a significant delay, i.e., a transaction like this is not valid for another few days.

With this, Yamata cannot access the users' assets, yet the user can always withdraw them if Yamata is non-cooperative.
